description:
Now with 1,300+ satisfied students!

LATEST: Course Updated On June 3rd, 2016Â 

  • Would you like to play guitar SO THAT you can worship and play your favorite songs!?
  • Would you like to learn at your own pace, when you want, where you want, and at the most affordable price!?
  • What if you could learn only 4 songs that would unlock a thousand songs!?
  • I believe ANYONE can learn with this method! Yes, even you!
  • Enroll and be jamming in a week!!!
  • 30 day, full money back guarantee, with no questions asked!

About this course:

I believe, this is the simplest and easiest way to learn the basics of guitar. Right off the bat I get you playing guitar and learning techniques through PLAYING SONGS! People learn best when they are actively doing what they enjoy! I cut out all the unnecessarily lingo and theory and get you right in.

After one week, you will be able to play a song!

Believe it or not, but most worship songs are not very different. Most are either one of four different chord patterns. I will teach you 4 different songs that will empower you to play almost every popular worship song!

Artists like,

Hillsong, Tomlin, Crowder, Sovereign Grace, Jesus Culture, and Classic Hymns.

In this course I will teach you,

  • "Crash Course" - How to choose a guitar, tune it, strum it, change the strings, how to play a chord, etc.

After the "Crash Course" you will start learning how to play songs. I will teach you how to play 4 different songs that contain the basic framework and skills of most songs out there!

  • 4 songs that will unlock a thousand.
  • How do I continue to progress without this course?
  • "Advanced Songs"- If there is a demand, I will continue to add different songs and teach you how to play them focusing on new techniques from each, like slapping, advanced picking, advanced strumming, body percussion, and more.

How long will it take?

Remember, Udemy frees you up to learn as quick or slow as you want. Its on your terms! But I suggest that it will take the average student about 1-2 months to learn (Depending on your natural talent and diligence).

While many others would still be learning basic theory, you will be jamming away!
title: Learn Guitar to Worship: Learn 4 Songs and unlock a 1,000!
